TopicTitle: Squadcast Summary 2015-03-06 - the Vomit Comet edition

Articles.Content:
Not sure why we're missing the summary for this Squadcast, so I'll take the lead this time. It was a rather exciting Squadcast, with lots of information, so let's dive right in!

- Maxmaps was ill, so KSPTV was hosting Teflon\_mike instead. 

![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

(Hopefully Maxmaps will be feeling better soon, and also hopefully we'll have a double-dose of information this coming Friday)

> 
> Not sure why we're missing the summary for this Squadcast, so I'll take the lead this time. It was a rather exciting Squadcast, with lots of information, so let's dive right in!
> - Maxmaps was ill, so KSPTV was hosting Teflon\_mike instead. 
> 
> ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> 
> (Hopefully Maxmaps will be feeling better soon, and also hopefully we'll have a double-dose of information this coming Friday)

Uhm, so they cancelled the Squadcast then?

Yes.

For that night. I was disappointed.
You raised my hopes and dashed them quite expertly, sir! Bravo!

Aw.. I was really anticipating for the summary. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Indeed did I feel disappointed as well.

i'm sad now

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

get well soon max

Duh. 

I was waiting for it, locked and loaded, but there's nothing? I find your lack of Squadcast.... Disturbing.

> 
> You raised my hopes and dashed them quite expertly, sir! Bravo!

Brilliant XD

> 
> Not sure why we're missing the summary for this Squadcast, so I'll take the lead this time. It was a rather exciting Squadcast, with lots of information, so let's dive right in!
> - Maxmaps was ill, so KSPTV was hosting Teflon\_mike instead. 
> 
> ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> 
> (Hopefully Maxmaps will be feeling better soon, and also hopefully we'll have a double-dose of information this coming Friday)

Great title ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Yeah I was wondering about this. Feel better Max ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Renegrade, why you gotta break my brain?! ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Anyways, too bad for the Squadcast. Get better soon, max! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

(Note that Max's specific illness wasn't stated - I just went with the first silly space illness reference I could come up with. My other choice was 'space dementia', but that sounds more permanent to me)
